selection_logic.rule: BK2 requires 8 core document types per BR18 §497
selection_logic.reason: Standard commercial/industrial buildings with medium fire risk

document_descriptions.START: Starterklæring - Initial declaration from certified fire consultant
document_descriptions.ITT: Installationsteknisk tilsyn - Technical supervision during construction
document_descriptions.DBK: Dokumentation for brandtekniske installationer - Fire system documentation
document_descriptions.PFP: Plan for periodisk funktionsafprøvning - Periodic testing plan
document_descriptions.FUNK: Funktionsbeskrivelse - Functional description of fire systems

excluded_documents.reason: These documents are only required for BK3/BK4 (complex buildings)

why_these_documents.DBK: Required because building has fire alarm and sprinkler systems
why_these_documents.BSR: Required for all BK2+ buildings to document fire safety approach
why_these_documents.BPLAN: Required to explain overall fire strategy to authorities
why_these_documents.DIM: Required to show calculations for evacuation routes and fire resistance
why_these_documents.FUNK: Required to document how fire systems work together
why_these_documents.KPLA: Required to ensure quality during construction phase

special_requirements: CFD simulation may be required if hall area > 2000 m² (not applicable here)
Sprinkler documentation must include hydraulic calculations
Fire resistance class R60 appropriate for this fire load

notes: This is the standard BK2 package. It represents the majority of commercial/industrial projects in Denmark. The package ensures thorough documentation while avoiding excessive complexity.
